viewDetails: Comprehensive highway development project covering 150km of road network improvement, including bridge construction and traffic management systems.
Digital transformation project for schools including computer labs, smart boards, and teacher training programs across 200 schools.
Establishment of 50 new healthcare centers and mobile clinic services to improve healthcare access in rural communities.
Installation of water purification systems and distribution networks to provide clean drinking water to 100,000 residents.
Construction of solar and wind energy facilities with 500MW total capacity to reduce carbon emissions and provide sustainable energy.
Development of comprehensive e-governance platform for citizen services, document management, and transparent governance processes.
Introduction of modern farming techniques, irrigation systems, and crop management technologies to increase agricultural productivity.
Construction of affordable housing units for low-income families with modern amenities and sustainable design features.
Development of tourist facilities, heritage site preservation, and eco-tourism infrastructure to boost local economy.
Modernization of public bus fleet with electric vehicles, improved bus stops, and integrated ticketing system for better urban mobility.
